noun.description: A note having the time value of a quarter of a whole note or half a half note, represented by a large solid dot with a plain stem; a quarter note.
A perverse or unfounded belief or notion.
examples: the natural crotchets of inveterate bachelors

origin: Middle English (in the sense hook): from Old French crochet, diminutive of croc hook, from Old Norse krókr.
